name: Ruins of Istanbul
description:
Ruins of Istanbul is a VR Action Horror-shooter game with gore and linear campaign. The main sources of inspiration are Arizone Sunshine, Smell of Death and Walking Dead.
Ruins of Istanbul gives you an opportunity to experience Belgrad Forest in the north side of Istanbul. Different type of weapons give you ability to concentrate on fire when you are inside a group of zombies.
Mobility like climbing, shooting while sliding on zipline with a crowbar can give you fast paced actions in game.
The story is minimal because of the early access status of the game, however it will explain the untold mysteries in the full version.
The game targets the all types of players who love Action Shooters with dark theme.

Fate gave you a chance, will you manage to take it or die trying? There’s only one way to know: Fight!
